title: Someone I don't know is playing on my account
body:
I have changed my password but if they get back on I would like riot to help me find this person and give them the boot. They are playing bot games and feeding hardcore. If anyone can help me please do.

edit: I have a url from one of their games - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2273573184/222016449

replies.body:
If someone is continuously able to get on your account after a password reset, they may either have a keylogger on your PC or access to the email tied to your account. It would be a good idea to [scan your PC](https://www.malwarebytes.com/antimalware/) for any sketchy outsiders and change the password for the email on your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YEic7ydV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-22T23:28:07.076+0000)
>
> If someone is continuously able to get on your account after a password reset, they may either have a keylogger on your PC or access to the email tied to your account. It would be a good idea to [scan your PC](https://www.malwarebytes.com/antimalware/) for any sketchy outsiders and change the password for the email on your account.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you
Already thought about changing the password??

> [{quoted}](name=ZetCrafting,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YEic7ydV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-22T19:59:35.379+0000)
>
> Already thought about changing the password??

I already did. thing it I am now 90% sure that it is a bot. they pick exact same summs, runes, and masteries as I do in the previous match and they turn on auto attacks (they also feed bots), either someone has stolen and tried to sell me account or someone is hacking me to advertise with a bot.

Ok i think if someone is hacking your account after you change your password again just let the league of legends support know they might be able to check it.

Hope for you it works now

> [{quoted}](name=ZetCrafting,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YEic7ydV,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-22T23:21:32.405+0000)
>
> Ok i think if someone is hacking your account after you change your password again just let the league of legends support know they might be able to check it.
> 
> Hope for you it works now

Thank you
